meanings.sent1: The classroom was spacious enough for all the students to move around comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The new house had a spacious living room perfect for family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The spacious picnic basket could fit all the delicious treats for the outing.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was as spacious as the endless sky, full of creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The spacious garden welcomed visitors with open arms, offering a peaceful retreat.

meanings.definition: Capable of holding or accommodating a large quantity
meanings.sent1: The spacious backpack easily held all of his school books and supplies.
meanings.sent2: The spacious car trunk was able to fit all the camping gear for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The spacious fridge stored enough food to feed a hungry army.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was as spacious as the ocean, capable of holding endless love.
meanings.sent5: The spacious warehouse could accommodate all the boxes without any crowding.
